abstract: Candis Cayne became first transgender actress to appear on network television, cast on ABC's Dirty Sexy Money in 2007, but she soon faded from public view; recently, however, she has emerged again, in much larger venues, after becoming a close confidante and sidekick to Caitlyn Jenner on E! reality television program I Am Cait; Cayne says she is not disturbed by sudden flood of attention from celebrity press, given importance of show that puts complexity of transgender issues before the American public.
lead_paragraph: She was one of the first transgender actresses to appear on a network TV show. Then the roles dried up ... until “I Am Cait.” Now she seems determined to make sure her fame is not fleeting.

headline.main: Candis Cayne, From Chelsea Drag Queen to Caitlyn Jenner’s Sidekick
headline.print_headline: Back in the  Limelight, as a Sidekick

snippet: She was one of the first transgender actresses to appear on a network TV show. Then the roles dried up ... until “I Am Cait.” Now she seems determined to make sure her fame is not fleeting.
